Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies.conditions

Decision-making auxiliary classes for the Enemy AI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseAttacked
    Checks for attacks on the enemy base on the specified lane.
    CardOnHand
    Checks for a card on the enemy's hand.
    CardOnMap
    Checks for the presence of a card on the map.
    Condition
    A Condition evaluates a specific circumstance in battles in order to help the AI in making decisions.
    EnergyCondition
    Checks the enemy's energy status.
    HealthCondition
    Checks the enemy's health status.
    True
    A condition that always returns true.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Condition.Comparator
    Symbols for logical operators used in numeric comparisons.
